conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it will be directed into containers D, E, or F.
Baffle A is at the top left, and the liquid will be redirected by it.
Baffle B is in the middle, and the liquid will be redirected by it.
Baffle C is at the top right, and the liquid will be redirected by it.
The liquid will be redirected to the right by Baffle A.
The liquid will be redirected downward by Baffle B.
The liquid will be redirected to the left by Baffle C.
Liquid from A will flow to the right and then downward, eventually flowing into container E.
Liquid from B will flow downward and then to the right, eventually flowing into container F.
Liquid from C will flow to the left and then downward, eventually flowing into container D.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
Liquid from C will flow into container D.
